Translations.Text: Ani nihsansaya, yunusa dekhila paigambarampaiki hote
Jevha te paluna ja'una bharelalya naukejavala pohocale
Maga (phasa takuna) nava kadhale gele, tevha he parabhuta jhale
Maga tyanna masane giluna takale ani te svatahcaca dhihkkara karu lagale
Tevha jara te tasbiha (allahace gunagana) karanaryampaiki nasate
Tara lokanna uthavile janyacya divasaparyanta masacya potataca rahile asate
Tara amhi tyala sapata maidanata takuna dile, ani tya veli to ajari hota
Ani tyacyavara savali karanare eka velice jhada ugavile
Ani amhi tyanna eka lakha, kimbahuna tyahuna jasta lokankade pathavile
Tevha tyanni imana rakhale ani amhi eka tharavika mudataparyanta tyanna sukha suvidha pradana keli
Tyanna jara vicara ki, kaya tumacya palanakartyacya tara muli (kan'ya) aheta ani tyancyasathi putra aheta
Kinva he tya veli hajara hote, jevha amhi pharistyanna striya banavuna nirmana kele
Khabaradara raha ki he loka apalya manane racalelya gosti bolata aheta
Ki allahala santana (mule bale) aheta, nihsansaya, he agadi khotarade aheta
Kaya allahane svatahkarita kan'yanna putranvara pradhan'ya dile
Tumhala jhale tari kaya, kasa hukuma lavata phirata
Kaya tumhala evadhehi samajata nahi
Kinva tumacyajavala (tyavisayi) ekhade spasta pramana ahe
Tara maga ja, sacce asala tara apalaca grantha ghe'una ya
Ani tya lokanni tara allaha ani jinnancya daramyanahi nate kayama kele ahe, ani vastavika jinna loka svatah he jnana balagatata ki te (asi srad'dha rakhanare azabacya samora) prastuta kele jatila
He, je kahi (allahavisayi) sangata aheta, tyapasuna sarvasrestha allaha pavitra (alipta) ahe
Matra allahacya sacca pramanika dasankherija
Visvasa kara ki tumhi sarva ani tumaci (khoti) upasye
Kona ekalahi bahakavu sakata nahi
Matra tyancyakherija, je jahannamamadhye janaraca aheta
(Pharistyance kathana ahe) ki amacyapaiki pratyekace sthana nirdharita ahe
Ani amhi (allahacya ajnapalanata) panktibad'dha (ranganni) ubhe ahota
Ani tyaci tasbiha (pavitryagana) karita ahota
Ani kaphira tara mhanata asata
Ki jara amacyajavala purvicya lokanci smrti asati
Tara amhi dekhila allahace nivadaka dasa banalo asato
Parantu maga tyanni ya (kura'ana) ca inkara kela, tevha tyanna lavakaraca kaluna ye'ila
Ani nihsansaya, amaca vayada adhica apalya paigambarankarita lagu jhalela ahe
Ki nihsansaya, tyaca lokanci madata keli ja'ila
Ani amace sain'ya varcasvasali (ani sresthatama) rahila
Ata tumhi kahi divasa paryanta yancyakaduna tonda phiravuna ghya
Ani tyanna pahata raha, ani te dekhila lavakaraca pahatila
Kaya he amacya (siksa-yatanankarita gha'i majavita aheta)
(Aika!) Jevha amaca azaba (siksa yatana) tyancya maidanammadhye ye'ila, tya veli tyanci, jyanna savadha kele gele hote, phara va'ita sakala asela
Ani tumhi kahi kalaparyanta tyancyakaduna dhyana hatava
Ani pahata raha, he sud'dha lavakaraca pahatila
Pavitra ahe tumaca palanakarta, jo motha pratistha balaganara ahe, tya pratyeka gostihuna ji (anekesvaravadi) bolata asatata
Ani paigambaranvara salama ahe
Ani samasta prasansa, sarva visvancya palanakartya allahakarita ahe
